Body:
self.model = OLS(solver='pinv', fit_intercept=True, est_stderr=True,
    reg_method=None, alpha=0, l1_ratio=0, tol=0.0001, max_iter=100, coef=
    None, stderr=None, dispersion=None)
self.model.fit(self.X[0:1, :], self.Y[0:1,], sample_weight=0.5)
self.assertEqual(self.model.coef.shape, (2, 7))
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.dispersion, np.array([[0, 0
    ], [0, 0]]), decimal=6)
np.testing.assert_array_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(self.X[0:1, :],
    self.Y[0:1,]), np.array([0]))
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(np.array
    (self.X[0:1, :].tolist() * 6), np.array([[60323, 60323], [0, 60323], [
    60323, 60323], [60322, 60323], [60322, 60322], [60323, 60323]])), np.
    array([0, -np.Infinity, 0, -np.Infinity, -np.Infinity, 0]), decimal=3)
